subject: Hockey, Ice
lead_paragraph: Mattias Ritola scored twice in the second period and the Tampa Bay Lightning dealt a blow to host Toronto’s playoff hopes with a 6-2 rout of the Maple Leafs.
snippet: Mattias Ritola scored twice in the second period and the Tampa Bay Lightning dealt a blow to host Toronto’s playoff hopes with a 6-2 rout of the Maple Leafs.
